elements.text: You are talking on the phone with a friend while cooking dinner. You're surprised to find that you are having trouble multitasking between having a conversation and cooking. You decide to call your friend back after you have finished cooking and know that they will be...

elements.name: Multitasking While Cooking_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
